author: apetrelli
msg: Added docs to describe the new classes in tiles-extras.

author: tcunning
msg: Add back the axis-saaj, axis-jaxrpc, and commons-discovery dependencies
as scope level dependencies so we can run the tests with AxisTransport.

author: arkurth
msg: Fixed bug in image retrieval for xCAT.pm and vmware.pm. It wasn't accurately detecting if another image retrieval SCP process was running. It was getting hung up on SCP processes started by vmware.pm which send images to VMware hosts. The pgrep regex was fixed.

Added short delay before retrieving image for the number of seconds equal to the last digit of the reservation ID.  This prevents multiple reservations for the same image from starting SCP processes at the same time.

author: gertv
msg: Fix test failures on slower CI build machines
